languages.text: "Н-не волнуйтесь за нас, {mf|господин|госпожа}. Немного в себя придем, и сразу же двинемся. Тени укроют нас от кошмаров. Тени и немного... везения".

traits.locale_text: "Н-не волнуйтесь за нас, {mf|господин|госпожа}. Немного в себя придем, и сразу же двинемся. Тени укроют нас от кошмаров. Тени и немного... везения".

languages.text: "D-don't you worry about us, {mf|master|mistress}. We'll just catch our breath and move on. The shadows will hide us from the Nightmares. The shadows and... just a tiny bit of luck."
languages.original_text: "Н-не волнуйтесь за нас, {mf|господин|госпожа}. Немного в себя придем, и сразу же двинемся. Тени укроют нас от кошмаров. Тени и немного... везения".

traits.locale_text: "D-don't you worry about us, {mf|master|mistress}. We'll just catch our breath and move on. Shadows will hide us from the nightmares. Shadows and... just a tiny bit of luck."
"D-don't you worry about us, {mf|master|mistress}. We'll just catch our breath and move on. Shadows will hide us from the nightmares. Shadows and... just a tiny bit of luck."
"D-don't you worry about us, {mf|master|mistress}. We'll just catch our breath and move on. Shadows will hide us from the Nightmares. Shadows and... just a tiny bit of luck."
"D-don't you worry about us, {mf|master|mistress}. We'll just catch our breath and move on. Shadows will hide us from the Nightmares. Shadows and... just a tiny bit of luck."
"D-don't you worry about us, {mf|master|mistress}. We'll just catch our breath and move on. The shadows will hide us from the Nightmares. The shadows and... just a tiny bit of luck."
"D-don't you worry about us, {mf|master|mistress}. We'll just catch our breath and move on. The shadows will hide us from the Nightmares. The shadows and... just a tiny bit of luck."

languages.text: “不……不用担心我们，{mf|主人|女主人}。我们只要喘口气，就能继续前进了。我们可以藏在影子里，躲过那些梦魇。只要有影子……和一点点运气就够了。”
languages.original_text: "D-don't you worry about us, {mf|master|mistress}. We'll just catch our breath and move on. The shadows will hide us from the Nightmares. The shadows and... just a tiny bit of luck."

traits.locale_text: “不……不用担心我们，{mf|主人|女主人}。我们只要喘口气，就能继续前进了。我们可以藏在影子里，躲过那些梦魇。只要有影子……和一点点运气就够了。”

languages.text: «N-no se preocupe por nosotros, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Recuperaremos el aliento y continuaremos. Las sombras nos ocultarán de las pesadillas. Las sombras y... un poquito de suerte».
languages.original_text: "D-don't you worry about us, {mf|master|mistress}. We'll just catch our breath and move on. The shadows will hide us from the Nightmares. The shadows and... just a tiny bit of luck."

traits.locale_text: «N-no se preocupe por nosotros, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Recuperaremos el aliento y continuaremos. Las sombras nos ocultarán de las pesadillas. Las sombras y... un poquito de suerte».

languages.text: 「わ、我らのことはお気になさらず、{mf|マスター|ミストレス}。一休みしてから移動します。この影があればナイトメアからも隠れられます。この影と…ごくわずかな運があれば」
languages.original_text: "D-don't you worry about us, {mf|master|mistress}. We'll just catch our breath and move on. The shadows will hide us from the Nightmares. The shadows and... just a tiny bit of luck."

traits.locale_text: 「わ、我らのことはお気になさらず、{mf|マスター|ミストレス}。一休みしてから移動します。この影があればナイトメアからも隠れられます。この影と…ごくわずかな運があれば」

languages.text: « N-Ne vous en faites pas pour nous, {mf|maître|maîtresse}. On reprendra notre route dès qu'on aura récupéré un peu. Les ombres nous cacheront aux yeux des cauchemars. Les ombres et... un soupçon de chance. »
languages.original_text: "D-don't you worry about us, {mf|master|mistress}. We'll just catch our breath and move on. The shadows will hide us from the Nightmares. The shadows and... just a tiny bit of luck."

traits.locale_text: « N-Ne vous en faites pas pour nous, {mf|maître|maîtresse}. On reprendra notre route dès qu'on aura récupéré un peu. Les ombres nous cacheront aux yeux des cauchemars. Les ombres et... un soupçon de chance. »

languages.text: "S-Sorgt Euch nicht um uns {mf|Herr|Herrin}. Wir müssen nur etwas zu Atem kommen, dann gehen wir weiter. Die Schatten werden uns vor den Albträumen verbergen. Die Schatten und ... ein wenig Glück."
languages.original_text: "D-don't you worry about us, {mf|master|mistress}. We'll just catch our breath and move on. The shadows will hide us from the Nightmares. The shadows and... just a tiny bit of luck."

traits.locale_text: "S-Sorgt Euch nicht um uns {mf|Herr|Herrin}. Wir müssen nur etwas zu Atem kommen, dann gehen wir weiter. Die Schatten werden uns vor den Albträumen verbergen. Die Schatten und ... ein wenig Glück."
